channel.title: Is there any way to connect my server to the client without running runseve.bat?
channel.description: The title says it all. I have a PI server named brokenx v2 and i really want to have it up but who plays has to have my source file but that means they can edit there character and i thought about making a webclient but the tutorials dont make any sense to me. I have portforwarded port 43594 and it said the port was open but i have a cable connection to my modem but when i go to runelocus server status checker it says my server is offline. So Is There Any Way To Connect Your Server To The Client Without Runserver.Bat? Please help Fast!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Is there any way to connect my server to the client without running runseve.bat?
item.dc:creator: @blckranger11 blckranger11
item.description:
@blckranger11 wrote:

Thank You:)

If you know how to portforward please help me here:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,521322.0.html
Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Is there any way to connect my server to the client without running runseve.bat?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

You change the client ip so they can connect to you,
you only keep the source where u run your runserver.bat
others will be able to connect on your server with only the client

Read full topic

item.title: Is there any way to connect my server to the client without running runseve.bat?
item.dc:creator: @blckranger11 blckranger11
item.description:
@blckranger11 wrote:

So basicly it needs to be port forwarded and i need to change the ip to my no-ip host and give people the client and when i want server online i run the game client and runserver.bat?

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any way to connect my server to the client without running runseve.bat?

item.title: Is there any way to connect my server to the client without running runseve.bat?
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

The runserver.bat is just an executable command so you don’t have to open a Command Prompt session and type the command yourself. What you want to do is unachievable. If you wanted to remove the need for running it through a terminal you’d need a GUI for your server and then build it into a Jar. But you seem to be having IT problems your end, which has nothing to do with your Runescape private server.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any way to connect my server to the client without running runseve.bat?

item.title: Is there any way to connect my server to the client without running runseve.bat?
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

LMAOOOO :eek: :eek: they need your client not your source to play your server. You run the server and others play with the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there any way to connect my server to the client without running runseve.bat?
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

you have to change the client to an “online” ip adress/… and you have it on local host so they only connect to themselves… and if its online then people only need the client.

Read full topic
